thread.title: John Legend’s Twitter was hacked, forgets to remove small detail in bio (5 Photos)
thread.title_full: John Legend’s Twitter was hacked, forgets to remove small detail in bio (5 Photos)

author: Kayla
title: John Legend’s Twitter was hacked, forgets to remove small detail in bio (5 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
The only time I really care about celebrities is when something funny happens. Take John Legend’s Twitter getting hacked for example. 2 
The hacker was mostly hilarious and a tiny bit vulgar. He eventually got his account back and deleted the rouge tweets, but he forget to change one small detail in his bio. 
A nice lady sent Chrissy Teigen a DM about the slip up and she just thought it was the best thing ever. 3 
John responded with a few funny tweets and didn’t seem to care too about the whole incident since it was mostly innocent. He did tell his hacker to make up their mind about the size of his manhood though. 4
